author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
title: Coronavirus in Brazil: Cuban doctors wait for their chance
description: Cuban doctors are renowned for their expertise with epidemics. As COVID-19 spreads, Brazil is considering giving medical licenses to thousands of Cuban physicians in the country. This one is waiting for his chance.
content:
Raymond Garcia has experience with epidemics. First he treated cholera in Haiti. He battled H1N1 in Venezuela. Ebola in Guinea Bissau. Zika, chikunguya, Chagas.
Now that the COVID-19 pandemic is sweeping the world, he is in Brazil. But his hands are tied.
